articles.title: NASA’s Mars Streak Mystery Might Finally Be Solved – And It’s Not Great News - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A sweeping machine learning study scanning over 86,000 high-res Mars images reveals that the mysterious streaks seen on Martian slopes are likely dry dust slides, not evidence of flowing water as previously hoped. Long debated as possible indicators of presen…
articles.content:
Thousands of odd streaks once thought to be signs of liquid water on Mars are likely just dust slipping downhill, according to a massive AI analysis. Credit: NASA
